short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that adds some useful feature to beatport.com site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The following features are added to the website: played item highlight and remembering the last played item, play next and previous items with keyboard shortcut (a -> previous, z -> next)
